name: Tanks! (Feline Entity)
description:
This is a simple Online Multiplayer Tanks game, based on the minigame in Wii Play. 

WASD - Move Tank
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Space - Place Mine

Bullets bounce twice before exploding, and every player can have 5 bullets on the map. Mines can blow up brick blocks.

To play with friends online, make sure the host has port 3000 open on their router. Up to 4 players can play with each other. There are only 2 maps so far.
